entities.name: Idea
entities.description: An idea belonging to a portal Idea Forum.

attributes.name: ideaId
attributes.description: Shows the entity instances.

attributes.name: createdOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedOnBehalfBy
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerId
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningBusinessUnit
attributes.description: Shows the business unit that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningUser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningTeam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: stateCode
attributes.description: Shows whether the idea is active or inactive. Inactive records are read-only and can't be edited unless they are reactivated.

attributes.name: statusCode
attributes.description: Select the idea's status.

attributes.name: versionNumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: importSequenceNumber
attributes.description: Shows the sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddenCreatedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timeZoneRuleVersionNumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: UTCConversionTimeZoneCode
attributes.description: Shows the time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Shows the name or title of the idea.

attributes.name: approved
attributes.description: Indicates whether or not this idea is approved for display.

attributes.name: authorEmail
attributes.description: Shows the email address for the author of this idea.

attributes.name: authorId
attributes.description: The author of the idea.

attributes.name: authorName
attributes.description: Shows the name for the author of this idea.

attributes.name: commentPolicy
attributes.description: Indicates the comment policy to be used for this idea.

attributes.name: copy
attributes.description: Type a description of the idea.

attributes.name: adxCreatedByIPAddress
attributes.description: Shows the IP address of the user when they submitted this idea.

attributes.name: adxCreatedByUsername
attributes.description: Shows the system username of the user when they submitted this idea.

attributes.name: submittedOn
attributes.description: Shows the date and time this idea was submitted.

attributes.name: ideaForumId
attributes.description: The parent idea forum that this idea belongs to.

attributes.name: partialURL
attributes.description: Shows the URL path fragment used to generate a URL for this idea.

attributes.name: statusAuthorId
attributes.description: The author of the idea's status.

attributes.name: statusComment
attributes.description: Type a comment for the status of the idea.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.description: Type an abstract of this idea.

attributes.name: votersTotalNumberOf
attributes.description: Shows the total number of voters for this idea.

attributes.name: votesDown
attributes.description: Shows the number of down votes this idea has received.

attributes.name: votesTotalNumberOf
attributes.description: Shows the total number of votes for this idea.

attributes.name: voteSum
attributes.description: Shows the calculated number of up votes minus down votes.

attributes.name: votesUp
attributes.description: Shows the number of up votes this idea has received.

attributes.name: totalVotes
attributes.description: Shows the total votes casted on the idea.

attributes.name: totalVotesDate
attributes.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Total Votes.

attributes.name: totalVotesState
attributes.description: State of rollup field Total Votes.

attributes.name: votesSum
attributes.description: Shows the sum of all votes casted on the idea.

attributes.name: votesSumDate
attributes.description: Last Updated time of rollup field Vote Sum.

attributes.name: votesSumState
attributes.description: State of rollup field Vote Sum.
